pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===============``referencing``===============|PyPI| |Pythons| |CI| |ReadTheDocs| |pre-commit|.. |PyPI| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/referencing.svg :alt: PyPI version :target: https://pypi.org/project/referencing/.. |Pythons| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/referencing.svg :alt: Supported Python versions :target: https://pypi.org/project/referencing/.. |CI| image:: https://github.com/python-jsonschema/referencing/workflows/CI/badge.svg :alt: Build status :target: https://github.com/python-jsonschema/referencing/actions?query=workflow%3ACI.. |ReadTheDocs| image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/referencing/badge/?version=stable&style=flat :alt: ReadTheDocs status :target: https://referencing.readthedocs.io/en/stable/.. |pre-commit| image:: https://results.pre-commit.ci/badge/github/python-jsonschema/referencing/main.svg :alt: pre-commit.ci status :target: https://results.pre-commit.ci/latest/github/python-jsonschema/referencing/mainAn implementation-agnostic implementation of JSON reference resolution.See `the documentation <https://referencing.readthedocs.io/>`_ for more details.
